homecomponent.title: What's Next?
homecomponent.subtitle: Here's what I'm planning to do next:
homecomponent.user_auth: Implement the user authentication system with Firebase (Login, Logout, Register, Forgot password)
homecomponent.user_Oauth: Implement Social login (Google, GitHub etc ... ) using firebase OAuth
homecomponent.crud_operation: CRUD operation in Table with Firebase
homecomponent.reusable_table: Reusable table with Sorting, Searching, and Pagination feature
homecomponent.Contact_form_email_notification: Add email notification for contact form submission with Firebase
homecomponent.eslint_prettier: Learn and implement ESLint and Prettier for better code quality
homecomponent.bundler: Learn and implement Webpack or any bundler for better build process
homecomponent.pagination_package: reusable pagination component and publish package in NPM
homecomponent.reusable_side_panel: Create a reusable side component in Angular with dynamic data pass and publish package in npm
homecomponent.loading_spinner: Handle loading indicators in angular: globally using http interceptor and locally for component wise
